page.title: 05DERWENT HUNT FAYRE, BROMPTON
page.content: Every year the{Derwent Hunt}have a fayre in the dale at{Brompton.}At the fayre they have horse competitons,dog shows,and other animal shows.They have stalls and rides.At the end of the day the{Master}of the{Derwent Hunt}takes his hounds into the ring to show everybody.The fayre was on{June the {16th}this year.The dale that the fayre is held in belongs to{Mr D Marley.} While the fayre is going on in the first dale, there is a horse and carrige competition going on in the forestry and in the other dales. At Brompton fayre there are things to do for everybody.There is a food stall held by the hunt with sandwiches,drinks and snacks for dinner. The{Derwent Hunt}is a group of people who meet up to hunt foxes.We need the fayre to raise money.
